body_html: Passing "/Za" to the compiler apprears to fix it. Disabling MSVC specific language extensions that are not C++11 conform might be a good idea in general. /fp:strict works as well and is more conservative.
body_text: Passing "/Za" to the compiler apprears to fix it. Disabling MSVC specific language extensions that are not C++11 conform might be a good idea in general. /fp:strict works as well and is more conservative.
body: Passing ["/Za"](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cpp/build/reference/za-ze-disable-language-extensions) to the compiler [apprears to fix it](https://godbolt.org/g/d9zbEn). Disabling MSVC specific language extensions that are not C++11 conform might be a good idea in general. [/fp:strict](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/e7s85ffb.aspx) works as well and is more conservative.
